An excellent new song, call'd, The languishing swain: or, The hard-hearted shepherdess. To a pleasant new play-tune. Licensed according to order.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : music.
Printed for J[osiah]. Blare, at the sign of the Looking-Glass on London-Bridge., [London] : [1685?]
Place and date of publication and publisher's name from Wing. Verse: "Happy's the man that's free from love ..." Printed in two columns. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
